§fEnchantment entries for each piece of equipment provide 0.5 armor
The main hand weapon enchantment entry provides 1 attack damage

The main hand weapon enchantment entry provides 1 attack damage
tetra_loopback.effect.crimson_scourge.to: §4When a creature hits, it applies Bleed and attaches a Calamity Mark, bleeding 1percent per second, and each mark increases its LOST-HP by 0.1percent, triggering the Scourge when it reaches 7 or more marks, and directly deducting 50percent of the creature's total HP
tetra.stats.tetra_loopback:crimson_scour: §4When a creature hits, it applies Bleed and attaches a Calamity Mark, bleeding 1percent per second, and each mark increases its LOST-HP by 0.1percent, triggering the Scourge when it reaches 7 or more marks, and directly deducting 50percent of the creature's total HP)
tetra_loopback.effect.strife.name: §6ß§dDisputes
tetra_loopback.effect.strife.tooltip: §dInflict Weakness 2 on hostile mobs when attacking hostile mobs, and Weakness 2 on self when attacking neutral or friendly creeps. When the caster is injured, gain Strength 3 and Resistance 2, and have a cooldown for 20 seconds
tetra.stats.tetra_loopback:strife.toolti: §dInflict Weakness 2 on hostile mobs when attacking hostile mobs, and Weakness 2 on self when attacking neutral or friendly creeps. When the caster is injured, gain Strength 3 and Resistance 2, and have a cooldown for 20 seconds
